Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This item is truly a masterpiece and holds significant value to us, reflecting its worth of $10,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. We hope this opportunity aligns with your budget and adds immense value to your collection or operations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
